bibl.title: The Septuagint and Homeric Scholarship in Alexandria. A Study in the Narrative of the Letter of Aristeas.
bibl.seg: HONIGMAN Sylvie, The Septuagint and Homeric Scholarship in Alexandria. A Study in the Narrative of the Letter of Aristeas.
London - New York, Routledge, 2003, 8°, xii-210 pp. ISBN 0-415-28072-9. £50.
C.R. par Corinne Bonnet, EtCl 73 (2005) pp. 389-390. - David Wasserstein, SCI 26 (2007) pp. 238-241. - Laurence Vianès, RHPhR 88 (2008) pp. 71-76.
